description: Semantic search for agent skills using natural language queries. Returns the most relevant skills based on the search query.

configuration.query: FROM agent_skills METADATA _score | WHERE name: ?query OR description: ?query OR short_description: ?query OR examples: ?query OR semantic_content: ?query | SORT _score DESC | LIMIT ?limit

query.description: Natural language search query to find relevant skills

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5)
